title: Lost in the Sky
description: As with every tragically-plotted love story, some sort of misfortune must occur. When we first meet our young heroine, she is faced with a predicament of a sortâ€¦ This is the beginning of just one of the many vividly written and witty stories in this anthology of tales written by Mara Joaquin, author of the novel Notorious. In it you will get lost in the sky of text and tales, in the trials and triumphs, in the sorrows and heartbreaks, and in the figures that live in the world of words. Twenty-one fantastic tales are included in this unique anthology about life, love, and searching for the self in a sea of selves.
author: Mara Joaquin
